key.name: original-activities-button-text

key.name: activities-config-button-removed
key.description: The Activities Button is removed.

key.name: activities-config-button-text
key.description: If not empty, it contains the custom text displayed for the Activities Button.

key.name: activities-text-padding
key.description: Horizontal padding for Activities Text.

key.name: activities-config-button-no-text
key.description: The Activities Button Text is not displayed if true.

key.name: activities-config-button-icon-path
key.description: If not empty, it contains the path of an icon displayed with the Activities Button Text.

key.description: Horizontal padding for Activities Icon.

key.description: The Activities Button Icon is not displayed if true.

key.name: activities-config-hot-corner-delay
key.description: Hot corner Overview toggle delay in milliseconds.

key.name: activities-config-hot-corner-threshold
key.description: Hot corner Overview toggle barrier pressure threshold in pixels.

key.name: activities-config-hot-corner
key.description: The Activities Hot Corner is disabled if true.

key.summary: Override theme background color and transparency.
key.description: Apply panel background color and transparency when user or classic theme is installed if true.

key.name: shell-theme-id
key.summary: Path or url or name and mode of currently loaded theme.
key.description: Set by extension at enable and when the shell theme is changed.

key.name: panel-background-color-hex-rgb
key.description: Default background color is black.

key.name: transparent-panel
key.description: Set panel transparency 0-100 per cent.

key.name: panel-shadow-color-hex-rgb
key.description: Default shadow color is black.

key.name: transparent-shadow
key.description: Set shadow transparency 0-100 per cent.

key.name: panel-shadow-vertical-length
key.description: Set shadow transparency 0-64 px.

key.name: panel-shadow-blur-radius
key.description: Set shadow blur radius 0-64 px.

key.name: panel-shadow-spread-radius
key.description: Set shadow spread radius 0-64 px.

key.description: The panel rounded corners are hidden if true.

key.summary: Hide panel app menu button icon.

key.summary: Panel background effects when a window is maximized on the primary display.
key.description: If 0 no effect. If 1 transparency is removed. If 2 background is set to opaque black with rounded corners.

key.name: enable-conflict-detection
key.description: If true conflict detection is enabled.

key.name: pointer-barriers-supported
key.description: If true X server supports barriers for Gnome Shell.

key.name: first-enable
key.description: If true extension sets defaults and displays prefs tool.

key.name: show-overview
key.description: If true extension displays overview after login.
